attributes.action: remove the entitlement to State Benefits from extremists and preachers of hate...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is a request to remove the entitlement to State Benefits from extremist trouble makers, who are perfectly fit for work but choose not to, so they can spend time stirring up hatred towards the country that is looking after their interests.
I/we feel the money given to these people would be better spent on helping pensioners heat their homes through the winter months and improving Health and Education Services for decent hardworking citizens.
